meanings.definition: One of four joint rulers or leaders.
meanings.sent1: The tetrarchs met to discuss important matters together.
meanings.sent2: The ancient kingdom was governed by a council of tetrarchs.
meanings.sent3: The tetrarchs decided to all wear matching hats for their meeting.
meanings.sent4: In the story, the four animals acted as tetrarchs of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The tetrarchs' unity was as strong as the four corners of a square.

meanings.definition: A group of four rulers or leaders.
meanings.sent1: The tetrarchs ruled the land with wisdom and fairness.
meanings.sent2: The historical painting depicted the tetrarchs standing together.
meanings.sent3: The tetrarchs' favorite game was playing chess against each other.
meanings.sent4: The tetrarchs' alliance was unbreakable, like a chain with four links.
meanings.sent5: The tetrarchs' presence was as powerful as the four seasons of the year.
